fullText: Grey House is a handsome production with some genuinely creepy moments, but it never quite coalesces into the spine-tingling experience it aspires to be.
dtliExcerpt: Grey House is a handsome production with some genuinely creepy moments, but it never quite coalesces into the spine-tingling experience it aspires to be.

never quite coalesces into the spine-tingling experience it aspires to be

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The review acknowledges production values and effective moments but expresses disappointment that the show fails to achieve its core goal of being truly frightening.
